attributes.additional_details:
Establish November 5th as the National day of England.
A day to celebrate our national relationship between politics, democracy, religion, monarchy and popular celebration.
This day is already established in the hearts and minds of English people across the globe and has much deeper significance that any other date in the calendar.
All great nations have national days based upon real and important historical events which help to define their national identity, rather than folktales.
